translation.game.title: Werewolves game
translation.intro.title: Welcome to my own version of werewolves game
translation.intro.additionalInfo: The game is played in real time with a chat room, specific roles, and a voting system. The game can be played by multiple users or computers in real time thanks to server-side WebSockets.
translation.intro.loading.info: It may take about 50 seconds when you first connect. Refresh the page if nothing changes.
translation.menu.title: Main Menu
translation.connected.title: Connected Players List
translation.connected.nousers: There are no users connected currently

translation.profile.head: Head

translation.create.error.CPUNbrNotPossible: The CPU number is not correct.
translation.create.error.giveRoomName: You have to give a name to your room.
translation.create.info.numberOnEachRole: You can only choose 1 player max per role. But for the classic werewolf and the villager, you can add up a maximum of 3 each if you wish.
translation.create.roomCreatedWaitingUsers: The room has been created...and is waiting to be populated with remaining users.
translation.create.info.cpuExplanation: CPU players will automatically fill the remaining spots and play with AI.
translation.create.error.needAtLeastOnePlayer: You need at least one real player
